item.title: Neovim Configuration
item.description: This blog is about configuring Neovim for Development. And also I expect you to have some basic knowledge of Lua because we are going to use Lua for configuring Neovim. We are using lua because it allow for more powerfull and flexible configuration options than traditional init.vim which uses vimscript for configuring your editor. My Neovim configuration repo -> https://github.com/samridht23/nvim Installing Neovim Arch Linux sudo pacman -S neovim You can also use AUR package to install Neovim latest development version.
